statement:
For any integer $n > 0$, the gamma function satisfes the following
relation:

$$\Gamma (nz) = (2 \pi)^{n - 1 \over 2} n^{nz - {1 \over 2}} \prod\limits_{k=0}^{n-1} \Gamma \left( z + {k \over n} \right)$$

This equation is true for all complex values of $z$ for which both sides
are defined.
